20110127140145.000|20110127140147.000|CC1|THE DRIVER HASN'T SEEN IT YET,  
20110127140147.000|20110127140149.000|CC1|BUT THAT'S ALL THE POWDER THAT  
20110127140149.000|20110127140150.000|CC1|FELL HERE.

20110127140153.000|20110127140155.000|CC1|HERE, THEY'RE NOW REPORTING     
20110127140155.000|20110127140157.000|CC1|NEARLY 48 INCHES OF SNOW THIS   
20110127140157.000|20110127140158.000|CC1|MONTH ALONE.                    
20110127140158.000|20110127140202.000|CC1|THAT MAKES IT THE SNOWIEST MONTH
20110127140202.000|20110127140204.000|CC1|ON RECORD FOR HARTFORD.         
20110127140204.000|20110127140205.000|CC1|47.8 INCHES, TO BE EXACT.       
20110127140205.000|20110127140207.000|CC1|THE MOST THEY HAD SEEN BEFORE

20110127140210.000|20110127140212.000|CC1|REPORTING HISTORIC SNOW THERE.

20110127140221.000|20110127140222.000|CC1|RELENTLESS PARADE OF STORMS

20110127140625.000|20110127140627.000|CC1|>> HAVE YOU TRIED TO CONVINCE   
20110127140627.000|20110127140628.000|CC1|HIM?                            
20110127140628.000|20110127140632.000|CC1|>> WELL, HE KNOWS HOW I FEEL.

20110127144412.000|20110127144417.000|CC1|     ADVISOR CAN DO FOR YOU.    
20110127144417.000|20110127144417.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20110127144417.000|20110127144418.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20110127144418.000|20110127144422.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20110127144422.000|20110127144422.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110127144422.000|20110127144424.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110127144424.000|20110127144424.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110127144424.000|20110127144426.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110127144426.000|20110127144428.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110127144428.000|20110127144430.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110127144430.000|20110127144430.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110127144430.000|20110127144432.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110127144432.000|20110127144432.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110127144432.000|20110127144434.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110127144434.000|20110127144434.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110127144434.000|20110127144436.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110127144436.000|20110127144438.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110127144438.000|20110127144438.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110127144438.000|20110127144440.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110127144440.000|20110127144440.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110127144440.000|20110127144443.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110127144443.000|20110127144443.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110127144443.000|20110127144445.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110127144445.000|20110127144445.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110127144445.000|20110127144448.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110127144448.000|20110127144450.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110127144450.000|20110127144450.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110127144450.000|20110127144451.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110127144451.000|20110127144453.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110127144453.000|20110127144453.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110127144453.000|20110127144455.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110127144455.000|20110127144455.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110127144455.000|20110127144457.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110127144457.000|20110127144458.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110127144458.000|20110127144458.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110127144458.000|20110127144501.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110127144501.000|20110127144501.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110127144501.000|20110127144503.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110127144503.000|20110127144503.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110127144503.000|20110127144505.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110127144505.000|20110127144507.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110127144507.000|20110127144507.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110127144507.000|20110127144509.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110127144509.000|20110127144509.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110127144509.000|20110127144511.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110127144511.000|20110127144511.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110127144511.000|20110127144513.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110127144513.000|20110127144513.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110127144513.000|20110127144515.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110127144515.000|20110127144515.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110127144515.000|20110127144517.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110127144517.000|20110127144517.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110127144517.000|20110127144520.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110127144520.000|20110127144521.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110127144521.000|20110127144523.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110127144523.000|20110127144523.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20110127144523.000|20110127144525.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20110127144525.000|20110127144525.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20110127144525.000|20110127144528.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20110127144528.000|20110127144528.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20110127144528.000|20110127144532.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.    
20110127144532.000|20110127144532.000|CC1|                     [ sneezes ]
20110127144532.000|20110127144535.000|CC1|CLIENT'S HERE.                  
20110127144535.000|20110127144535.000|CC1|WHOA! THAT ACHY COLD NEEDS

20110127145137.000|20110127145142.000|CC1|>> NOBODY USES CAPS ANYMORE.    
20110127145142.000|20110127145144.000|CC1|>> MATT, IT'S A
